Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Cermak due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Cermak due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#24 Wentworth

#29 State

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide service between 63rd and Grand in both directions

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
